R

RandomEvent - Class in main
Represents a random event that can occur in the game.

Creates a random event in the game.
randomQuit() - Method in class main.RandomEvent
Simulates a team member randomly quitting the team.
reduceBalance(int) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Reduces the balance by the specified amount.
reduceWeek() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Reduces the number of weeks by 1.
remainingWeeks() - Method in class main.Interaction
Retrieves the remaining weeks in the game season.

Removes an athlete from the list of available athletes.

Removes an item from the list of available items.

removeReserve(Athlete) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Removes the specified athlete from the reserves.
removeTeamMember(Athlete) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Removes the specified team member from the team.
resetBalance() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Resets the user's balance to the initial value of 100.
